## Stripe

## \+ Saasbox

Use this page as a central location to download your software.

[Get started now](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/integration/stripe)

### We started as a UX design and innovation agency

For those who don’t know yet, we used to be a design agency. We started évolt in 2015 to help clients build and improve digital products and the overall experience of their services. We could work with large international companies on their innovation strategy such as creating a digital product from scratch with tiny startups. We were a young team of UX/UI designers, UX researchers, developers, digital marketing experts, etc.

### The golden age of the design thinking approach

The ‘gold rush time’ of design thinking is happening now. As I said, from freelancers to large consultant companies, everyone sells design skills. Indeed, from 2015 to theses days, we saw two phenomenons:

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/634054c00f60203c4cb30692_pexels-elvis-2528118%207.png)

### Benifits  of UX :

- The rise of UX design freelancers
- The first one is the rise of independent experts
- Now common for them to work with freelancers
- Large organizations compete now

### When Capgemini, Mckinsey, Accenture, and IBM became design experts in their field

The last thing that pushed us to change our model and build a collaborative UX design tools was passion. Design is more than a methodology for us; it is a state of mind. And we want to incorporate that vision into intuitive products that will guide our users to a new way of thinking. We love building digital things and are like kids making a treehouse. We are proud of it, and we want to invite you in  So, we are pleased to invite you to join our community .

# Core Value Proposition

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/67ca896418ea71bda2cc4242_Vector%20(14).png)

AI-Driven Precision for Crypto

Utilize advanced machine learning models trained on crypto market dynamics to generate actionable trading signals.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/67ca896418ea71bda2cc4242_Vector%20(14).png)

Crypto Trading Agents

Build Agents that can take consistently winning trades on exchanges—both centralized and decentralized.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/67ca896418ea71bda2cc4242_Vector%20(14).png)

Real Crypto Alpha Generation

Rely on backtested AI grades to drive decisions that yield tangible profitability in the crypto space.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/67e646b01d874725315e4f02_8765.png)

# Developers, Traders, and Institutions Focused on Crypto

Unlock smarter strategies, optimize portfolios, and accelerate innovation with cutting-edge analytics tailored for traders, hedge funds, developers, and institutions.

Developers

Create market-leading trading tools, DeFAI apps, and agentic dashboards.

Traders & Hedge Funds

Deploy autonomous Agents that maximizes returns with real-time crypto data.

Institutions

Command unbelievable scale when you infuse AI Agents into your profit strategies.

# Developers, Traders, and Institutions Focused on Crypto

Unlock smarter strategies, optimize portfolios, and accelerate innovation with cutting-edge analytics tailored for traders, hedge funds, developers, and institutions.

Developers

Traders & Hedge Funds

Institutions

Integrate AI-powered agents into your crypto investment strategies for scalable, data-driven insights.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/67e6b2f0682f062d8c688781_Group%2017.png)

Use Cases

# Revolutionizing Crypto Trading:   AI-Driven Use Cases

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/67dd12debd4f9ac97d4d2270_Cyborg-2--Streamline-Core%201.svg)

Automate profitable trades on centralized crypto exchanges with AI Agents powered by our API.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/67dd12dc9c650e63bff30979_Cyborg--Streamline-Core%201.svg)

DEX Trading Agents

Execute on-chain trades on decentralized crypto exchanges (e.g., Uniswap, Aerodrome) for arbitrage, market-making, or sniping opportunities.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/67dd12db90f2c6f352f4f591_Frame%2098.svg)

Market Prediction Dashboards

Build real-time dashboards that provide traders with instant insights into crypto market trends using TMAI’s predictive power.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/67dd12db0a37ca1e33fb3663_Chat-Bubble-Text-Square--Streamline-Core%201.svg)

Telegram/Discord Agents

Create interactive agents that deliver crypto trading alerts and market insights directly to community channels.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/67dd12db2f0295038d381cb5_Ai-Prompt-Spark--Streamline-Core%20(1)%201.svg)

Web/Mobile/Desktop Applications

Develop user-friendly applications for crypto trading, portfolio management, and market intelligence powered by TMAI’s data.

# What is Asset Allocation and How Does it Impact Your Portfolio?

Learn everything about asset allocation and its crucial role in shaping your portfolio. Unlock the best strategies for maximizing returns on your investment.

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/6605645e4c74774c955f1c24_PP4.PNG)\\
\\
S. Vishwa](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/author/s-vishwa)

6 Minutes

![Asset Allocation](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/65b0ec08f052ab4102e275bb_Asset%20Allocation%20Strategies.webp)

Table of contents

[What is Crypto Asset Allocation?](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/asset-allocation#what-is-crypto-asset-allocation) [The Benefits of Diversification](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/asset-allocation#the-benefits-of-diversification) [Strategies for Crypto Asset Allocation](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/asset-allocation#strategies-for-crypto-asset-allocation) [Market Capitalization Allocation](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/asset-allocation#market-capitalization-allocation) [Geographic Allocation](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/asset-allocation#geographic-allocation) [Types of Cryptocurrencies](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/asset-allocation#types-of-cryptocurrencies) [Implementing Your Crypto Asset Allocation Strategy](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/asset-allocation#implementing-your-crypto-asset-allocation-strategy) [Conclusion](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/asset-allocation#conclusion) [Disclaimer](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/asset-allocation#disclaimer)

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b7877bd7dd2318cd3fe9a_Vector-2.svg)](https://twitter.com/tokenmetricsinc)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b7876de5c8d5e84bc18d0_Vector-1.svg)](https://www.facebook.com/tokenmetrics/)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b78762f9c2251084fe444_Vector.svg)](https://www.linkedin.com/company/tokenmetrics/)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/64461a3c22449c30f8100f2a_Blog_YT.svg)](https://www.youtube.com/tokenmetrics?sub_confirmation=1)

Cryptocurrency has become a popular investment option, attracting both seasoned investors and newcomers to the market. However, the extreme volatility and unpredictable nature of cryptocurrencies make it crucial to have a well-thought-out asset allocation strategy in order to maximize returns and minimize risk.

In this article, we will explore the concept of crypto asset allocation, its importance, and various strategies to help you navigate the cryptocurrency market effectively.

## What is Crypto Asset Allocation?

Crypto asset allocation refers to the process of dividing your cryptocurrency investments across different types of digital assets, such as coins and tokens, as well as considering factors like market capitalization, geographic location, and the underlying technology of the cryptocurrencies.

Asset allocation aims to spread your investments across a range of assets to reduce overall volatility and enhance long-term returns.

### The Benefits of Diversification

Diversification is a key principle in asset allocation, and it plays a crucial role in managing risk and increasing the potential for returns.

Investing in various cryptocurrencies can reduce the impact of poor-performing investments by offsetting them with investments that are performing well.

[Diversification](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/portfolio-diversification) helps to protect your portfolio from major losses and allows you to take advantage of potential opportunities across different sectors of the cryptocurrency market.

However, it's important to note that diversification does not eliminate systemic risk, which is the risk inherent in the entire cryptocurrency market.

While asset allocation can reduce overall volatility, it cannot completely eliminate cryptocurrency fluctuations and uncertainties.

## Strategies for Crypto Asset Allocation

Understanding and implementing effective strategies for crypto asset allocation is crucial for investors looking to navigate the dynamic market.

These strategies play a vital role in helping investors optimize their crypto portfolios, manage risk, and capitalize on the potential of digital assets.

### Market Capitalization Allocation

One common crypto asset allocation approach is investing in cryptocurrencies with different market capitalizations.

Market capitalization is the total value of a cryptocurrency, calculated by multiplying the price of each unit by the total number of units in circulation.

Investing in cryptocurrencies with varying market capitalizations allows you to balance the potential for high returns from smaller-cap coins with the stability and liquidity of larger-cap cryptocurrencies.

**Small Market Capitalization Cryptocurrencies**: Investing in [small-cap cryptocurrencies](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-crypto-altcoins) can be riskier but may offer significant growth potential.

These coins often have innovative technology or unique use cases that could lead to substantial returns if successful. However, smaller-cap coins also carry a higher risk of failure or price manipulation.

**Medium Market Capitalization Cryptocurrencies**: Medium-cap cryptocurrencies are seen as a balance between small and large-cap coins. They offer a moderate level of risk and potential returns.

These coins have established themselves to some extent in the market but still have room for growth.

**Large Market Capitalization Cryptocurrencies**: Investing in large-cap cryptocurrencies, such as Bitcoin and Ethereum, provides stability and liquidity to your portfolio.

These coins have a proven track record and strong market presence and are less susceptible to extreme price fluctuations. However, the potential for exponential growth might be relatively lower than smaller-cap coins.

### Geographic Allocation

Another factor to consider in crypto asset allocation is the geographic location of the cryptocurrencies or cryptocurrency projects. Different countries and jurisdictions have varying regulations and attitudes towards cryptocurrencies.

By diversifying your investments across different geographic locations, you can mitigate the risk of adverse regulatory changes or localized market downturns.

- **Crypto-Friendly Jurisdictions**: Some countries have embraced cryptocurrencies and have favorable [regulations](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/crypto-regulation) in place, encouraging innovation and growth in the crypto industry. Investing in cryptocurrencies originating from these jurisdictions can provide more stability and regulatory certainty.
- **Strict Regulatory Environments**: On the other hand, some countries have implemented strict regulations or even banned cryptocurrencies altogether. Investing in cryptocurrencies from these jurisdictions may carry additional risks due to the uncertain legal and regulatory landscape.

### Types of Cryptocurrencies

Another crucial aspect of crypto asset allocation is considering the different [types of cryptocurrencies](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/types-of-cryptocurrency) and their underlying technologies. Understanding the purpose and function of each type of cryptocurrency can help you diversify your portfolio based on their unique characteristics.

**Pure Currency Cryptocurrencies**: These are cryptocurrencies that primarily function as a medium of exchange and store of value, such as [Bitcoin](https://app.tokenmetrics.com/bitcoin).

Pure currency coins do not have any specific utility or underlying technology other than facilitating transactions. Investing in these coins can provide exposure to the broader cryptocurrency market and potential long-term growth.

**Stablecoins**: [Stablecoins](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/stablecoins) are cryptocurrencies designed to maintain a stable value by pegging their price to a specific asset, such as a fiat currency.

These coins can be used as a store of value and offer a hedge against market volatility. Stablecoins provide a bridge between the traditional financial system and the cryptocurrency world, allowing investors to hold their funds in a relatively stable asset.

**Utility Tokens**: Utility tokens serve a specific purpose or function within a blockchain ecosystem. They are used to access and utilize certain features or services the underlying platform offers.

Investing in utility tokens allows you to participate in the growth of specific blockchain projects and potentially benefit from their adoption and success.

**Security Tokens**: Security tokens represent ownership in an underlying asset or company and function as digital securities.

These tokens are subject to securities regulations and may offer investors financial rights, such as dividends or profit-sharing. Investing in security tokens provides exposure to traditional investment assets within the cryptocurrency space.

## Implementing Your Crypto Asset Allocation Strategy

When implementing your crypto asset allocation strategy, it's important to consider your risk tolerance, financial goals, and investment horizon. These factors will influence the weighting you assign to different cryptocurrencies and asset classes within your portfolio.

A well-balanced and diversified portfolio can help you navigate the cryptocurrency market and position yourself for potential growth while managing risk.

It's also essential to stay informed about the latest developments in the cryptocurrency market and regularly review and rebalance your portfolio.

The cryptocurrency market is highly dynamic, and the relative performance of different assets can change rapidly. You can optimize your returns and adapt to market conditions by staying proactive and adjusting your allocation as needed.

## Conclusion

Crypto asset allocation is a critical aspect of successful cryptocurrency investing. You can manage risk and maximize your long-term returns by diversifying your investments across different types of cryptocurrencies, market capitalizations, geographic locations, and underlying technologies.

Remember to consider your risk tolerance, financial goals, and investment horizon when constructing your portfolio. Regular monitoring and rebalancing are essential to ensure that your asset allocation aligns with your objectives.

With a well-thought-out asset allocation strategy, you can confidently navigate the cryptocurrency market and seize opportunities in this exciting and rapidly evolving space.

### Disclaimer

The information provided on this website does not constitute investment advice, financial advice, trading advice, or any other advice, and you should not treat any of the website's content as such.

[Token Metrics](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/) does not recommend buying, selling, or holding any cryptocurrency. Conduct your due diligence and consult your financial advisor before making investment decisions.

## What’s a Rich Text element?

The rich text element allows you to create and format headings, paragraphs, blockquotes, images, and video all in one place instead of having to add and format them individually. Just double-click and easily create content.

### Static and dynamic content editing

> A rich text element can be used with static or dynamic content. For static content, just drop it into any page and begin editing. For dynamic content, add a rich text field to any collection and then connect a rich text element to that field in the settings panel. Voila!

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/607d26b50a22aaadacc1e4dc_605890582fa058a6dc964c1c_1616416850520-image16.jpg)

Caption

#### How to customize formatting for each rich text

_Headings, paragraphs, blockquotes, figures, images, and figure captions can all be styled after a class is added to the rich text element using the "When inside of" nested selector system._

##### For dynamic content, add a rich text field to any collection

## Frequently Asked Questions

If you are hesitating, do not worry - we are here to explaineverything you might want to know. Let us help!

What do I get in the 7-day free trial?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

You get access to all the features promised on the Pricing page to see for yourself how powerful our AI-based crypto research platform is, helping you find profitable opportunities.

Do I get charged automatically after the trial ends?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

Yes, our payment processor will try to charge the card on your account after your trial period is over.

Can I cancel my account?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

If you feel like you’re not ready to use Token Metrics yet, you can cancel your plan any time you want by going to your Settings page and under the Subscription tab.

Can I get a refund?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

As long as you cancel your plan within 7 days of subscription, you can ask for the refund by contacting our support team on the website. This is more than enough to test our platform and see if it works for you.

Can I pay with Crypto?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

For now, we only accept debit and credit cards. However, we are actively working on accepting more payment types.

Can I get a free trial to test the VIP plan?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

You can not sign up for a trial VIP plan at this moment.

Can I upgrade my account in the future to access more features?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

Yes, you can upgrade any time you want to make the best out of Token Metrics. You will be issued a pro-rated refund for unused days on the current plan and then upgraded to the new plan.

How can I join the private Telegram groups for each plan?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

You can join our private Telegram groups to discuss cryptocurrencies by sending our bot a message at [@token\_metrics\_bot](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/reference/style-guide#) on Telegram.

Does Token Metrics trade for me?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

No, Token Metrics does not trade for you. You have to make your own investment decisions after doing your own research.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/63591461c338fa894d2a0dce_Ellipse%20blue.png)

# 6 Best Hardware Wallets for Safe Crypto Storage

Protect your crypto assets with the best hardware wallets of 2023. Learn about the best wallet options for safe and reliable cryptocurrency storage.

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/65312d81e43e944ef3fe306f_photo_2023-10-19_18-28-06.jpg)\\

Table of contents

[What are Crypto Hardware Wallets?](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-hardware-wallet#what-are-crypto-hardware-wallets) [Things to Consider While Choosing Crypto Hardware Wallets](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-hardware-wallet#things-to-consider-while-choosing-crypto-hardware-wallets) [List of Top Hardware Wallets in 2023](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-hardware-wallet#list-of-top-hardware-wallets-in-2023) [1\. Ledger Nano X](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-hardware-wallet#1-ledger-nano-x) [2\. Trezor Model T](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-hardware-wallet#2-trezor-model-t) [3\. [![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b7877bd7dd2318cd3fe9a_Vector-2.svg)](https://twitter.com/tokenmetricsinc)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b7876de5c8d5e84bc18d0_Vector-1.svg)](https://www.facebook.com/tokenmetrics/)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b78762f9c2251084fe444_Vector.svg)](https://www.linkedin.com/company/tokenmetrics/)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/64461a3c22449c30f8100f2a_Blog_YT.svg)](https://www.youtube.com/tokenmetrics?sub_confirmation=1)

Crypto investments have seen a meteoric rise over the years, and as more people join the blockchain revolution, the security of one's assets has become paramount.

Hardware wallets, often dubbed "cold storage", provide a secure method to keep digital assets safe from cyber threats and that’s why when it comes to securing your crypto assets, choosing the right hardware wallet is crucial.

In this post, we’ll explore the 6 best hardware wallets in 2023 for safe crypto storage, ensuring your digital investments are well-protected.

## What are Crypto Hardware Wallets?

Hardware wallets, commonly known as "cold wallets," are physical devices designed to securely store cryptocurrency private keys offline. These tools protect assets from online threats like hacks and malware since they keep private keys isolated from internet-connected devices.

To execute a transaction, users connect their hardware wallet to a device, sign the transaction offline, ensuring utmost [security](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/crypto-security), and then broadcast it online.

This method ensures the private keys remain inaccessible even if the connected device is compromised. As a result, hardware wallets are widely recognized as a top-tier security measure for crypto investors.

## Things to Consider While Choosing Crypto Hardware Wallets

When selecting a crypto hardware wallet, several factors demand careful consideration.

1\. Security features are paramount; ensure the wallet provides offline storage and employs advanced cryptographic techniques.

2\. Evaluate its build quality—a sturdy construction can prevent physical tampering. User experience is crucial; the interface should be intuitive, with clear instructions and prompts.

3\. Consider the range of supported cryptocurrencies—a broad spectrum can future-proof your investment.

4\. Look into any associated software; it should offer seamless integration and regular updates.

5\. Lastly, community reviews and feedback can offer real-world insights into the device's reliability and performance. By balancing these factors, users can confidently choose a [wallet](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-crypto-wallet) tailored to their needs.

## List of Top Hardware Wallets in 2023

As we navigate through 2023, an array of hardware wallets have emerged, each promising cutting-edge security and user-friendly interfaces.

These compact devices have become the bulwark against cyber threats, ensuring that one's digital treasure remains impervious to vulnerabilities.

But with an overwhelming number of options available, how does one discern the best from the rest?

Here's a curated list of top hardware wallets this year, offering a blend of robust security measures, extensive cryptocurrency support, and seamless user experience, designed to cater to both novices and seasoned crypto enthusiasts.

### 1\. Ledger Nano X

The [Ledger Nano X](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/ledger-cold-wallet) is a widely recognized and respected hardware wallet. It offers robust security features and supports over a thousand cryptocurrencies, providing not just safety but also versatility.

**Key Features**:

- Bluetooth functionality for easy connection to smartphone or computer.
- Compact and portable design.
- Backed up by a 24-word recovery phrase.

**Why it stands out**:

With its user-friendly interface and advanced security features, Ledger Nano X continues to be a popular choice for crypto enthusiasts.

**Cost**: $149 for Nano X ( [Check Latest Offers](https://shop.ledger.com/?r=b0ed3405a1c3&tracker=MY_TRACKER)).

**Cryptocurrencies supported**: More than 5,500.

### 2\. Trezor Model T

[Trezor Model T](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/trezor-wallet) is another top contender in the world of hardware wallets. It features a touchscreen interface and supports a broad range of cryptocurrencies.

**Key Features**:

- Touchscreen interface for easier use.
- Pin code and recovery seed for added security.
- Open-source software.

**Why it stands out**:

Trezor Model T's open-source software and extensive crypto support make it an excellent choice for those wanting additional security and functionality.

**Cost**: $213 for Model T ( [Check Latest Offers](https://affil.trezor.io/aff_c?offer_id=133&aff_id=33510&source=Tokenmetrics)).

**Cryptocurrencies supported**: More than 1,000.

### 3\. Coldcard Wallet

Coldcard Wallet is a Bitcoin-only wallet known for its high-level security features, making it an ideal choice for [Bitcoin](https://app.tokenmetrics.com/bitcoin) investors.

**Key Features**:

- Bitcoin-only wallet for dedicated investors.
- Secure element for keeping private keys safe.
- PIN and anti-phishing features.

**Why it stands out**:

If you are a dedicated Bitcoin investor, Coldcard’s Bitcoin-only focus and robust security features make it a top pick.

**Cost**: $157.94

**Cryptocurrencies supported**: Bitcoin-only wallet

### 4\. KeepKey

KeepKey offers a straightforward user experience with essential security features, making it suitable for beginners in crypto investment.

**Key Features**:

- Large screen for easy operation.
- Simple interface, ideal for beginners.
- Backup and recovery options.

**Why it stands out**:

KeepKey's simplicity and essential security features make it an ideal choice for those new to cryptocurrency.

**Cost**: $130.

**Cryptocurrencies supported**: More than 7,000.

### 5\. SafePal S1

SafePal S1 combines affordability with security, making it a desirable choice for budget-conscious crypto investors.

**Key Features**:

- Affordable without compromising security.
- Mobile compatibility for easy transactions.
- Multi-currency support.

**Why it stands out**:

For budget-conscious investors, SafePal S1 offers an affordable yet secure option for storing crypto.

**Cost**: $49.99 for basic hardware.

**Cryptocurrencies supported**: More than 30,000.

### 6\. BitBox02

BitBox02 is a modern and streamlined hardware wallet offering high-quality security and ease of use.

**Key Features**:

Touch and OLED screen for easy navigation.

USB-C and A compatible.

Backup on microSD card.

**Why it stands out**:

BitBox02 offers modern features and a streamlined user experience for those wanting an up-to-date hardware wallet.

**Cost**: $149.

**Cryptocurrencies supported**: Around 1500.

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q1. What's the difference between a hardware wallet and a software wallet?**

A hardware wallet is a physical device that securely stores a user's private keys offline, while a software wallet is a digital application on a computer or smartphone that keeps keys typically online or in the device's memory.

**Q2. How often should I update my hardware wallet's firmware?**

Regularly updating the firmware ensures you benefit from the latest security patches and features. Always follow the manufacturer's recommendations and ensure updates come from official sources.

**Q3. Can I store multiple cryptocurrencies on a single hardware wallet?**

Yes, most modern hardware wallets support multiple cryptocurrencies. However, it's essential to check the supported coins list for your specific device model.

**Q4. What happens if I lose my hardware wallet or it gets damaged?**

If you've kept a backup of your recovery seed—a series of words given during the initial setup—you can restore your funds on a new device. Always store your recovery seed securely and offline.

**Q5. Is it safe to buy a used hardware wallet?**

It's generally recommended to purchase hardware wallets new and directly from the manufacturer or trusted retailers to prevent potential tampering.

**Q6. How does a hardware wallet interface with blockchain networks if it's offline?**

The wallet itself only signs transactions offline. To broadcast the transaction to the network, the signed transaction is sent through a connected device, ensuring private keys remain offline.

**Q7. Are hardware wallets resistant to physical attacks?**

Many modern hardware wallets come with tamper-proof features. However, physical security is always crucial. Ensure you store your device in a safe place, and always be wary of potential tampering if left unattended.

**Q8. Can I use my hardware wallet with popular software wallets or exchanges?**

Most renowned hardware wallets integrate with popular software wallets and exchange platforms, allowing users a seamless experience. Always check compatibility lists before making a purchase.

## Conclusion

In 2023, these eight hardware wallets stand out for their unique features, security, and ease of use. Remember to consider your specific needs and requirements when choosing a hardware wallet for your crypto assets.

With the options listed above, you can ensure the safety and security of your investments, keeping your crypto assets protected against unauthorized access and potential threats.

Remember, while technology provides tools for security, the best protection is always awareness and education. Ensure you're up-to-date with best practices and always double-check transactions and addresses. Your crypto assets are valuable, and they deserve the highest level of care and protection.

### We started as a UX design and innovation agency

For those who don’t know yet, we used to be a design agency. We started évolt in 2015 to help clients build and improve digital products and the overall experience of their services. We could work with large international companies on their innovation strategy such as creating a digital product from scratch with tiny startups. We were a young team of UX/UI designers, UX researchers, developers, digital marketing experts, etc.

### The golden age of the design thinking approach

The ‘gold rush time’ of design thinking is happening now. As I said, from freelancers to large consultant companies, everyone sells design skills. Indeed, from 2015 to theses days, we saw two phenomenons:

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/634054c00f60203c4cb30692_pexels-elvis-2528118%207.png)

### Benifits  of UX :

- The rise of UX design freelancers
- The first one is the rise of independent experts
- Now common for them to work with freelancers
- Large organizations compete now

### When Capgemini, Mckinsey, Accenture, and IBM became design experts in their field

The last thing that pushed us to change our model and build a collaborative UX design tools was passion. Design is more than a methodology for us; it is a state of mind. And we want to incorporate that vision into intuitive products that will guide our users to a new way of thinking. We love building digital things and are like kids making a treehouse. We are proud of it, and we want to invite you in  So, we are pleased to invite you to join our community .

## Get in touch with us through the right channels.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/6360cb77798bc2d41f046650_Contact_icon.svg)

###### Help & Support

Check out our support docs to find answers to common questions.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/603f16412d15ef27b82eeee6_Vector-1.svg)

[support@tokenmetrics.com](mailto:support@tokenmetrics.com)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/6360cb77798bc2d41f046650_Contact_icon.svg)

###### Press & Media

Are you a journalist? Please contact us for all press inquiries at this email.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/603f16412d15ef27b82eeee6_Vector-1.svg)

[press@tokenmetrics.com](mailto:press@tokenmetrics.com)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/63591461da09771a32758924_Ellipse%20yellow.png)

## Frequently Asked Questions

If you are hesitating, do not worry - we are here to explaineverything you might want to know. Let us help!

What do I get in the 7-day free trial?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

You get access to all the features promised on the Pricing page to see for yourself how powerful our AI-based crypto research platform is, helping you find profitable opportunities.

Do I get charged automatically after the trial ends?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

Yes, our payment processor will try to charge the card on your account after your trial period is over.

Can I cancel my account?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

If you feel like you’re not ready to use Token Metrics yet, you can cancel your plan any time you want by going to your Settings page and under the Subscription tab.

Can I get a refund?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

As long as you cancel your plan within 7 days of subscription, you can ask for the refund by contacting our support team on the website. This is more than enough to test our platform and see if it works for you.

Can I pay with Crypto?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

For now, we only accept debit and credit cards. However, we are actively working on accepting more payment types.

Can I get a free trial to test the VIP plan?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

You can not sign up for a trial VIP plan at this moment.

Can I upgrade my account in the future to access more features?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

Yes, you can upgrade any time you want to make the best out of Token Metrics. You will be issued a pro-rated refund for unused days on the current plan and then upgraded to the new plan.

How can I join the private Telegram groups for each plan?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

You can join our private Telegram groups to discuss cryptocurrencies by sending our bot a message at [@token\_metrics\_bot](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/contact-us#) on Telegram.

Does Token Metrics trade for me?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

No, Token Metrics does not trade for you. You have to make your own investment decisions after doing your own research.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/63591461c338fa894d2a0dce_Ellipse%20blue.png)

### We started as a UX design and innovation agency

For those who don’t know yet, we used to be a design agency. We started évolt in 2015 to help clients build and improve digital products and the overall experience of their services. We could work with large international companies on their innovation strategy such as creating a digital product from scratch with tiny startups. We were a young team of UX/UI designers, UX researchers, developers, digital marketing experts, etc.

### The golden age of the design thinking approach

The ‘gold rush time’ of design thinking is happening now. As I said, from freelancers to large consultant companies, everyone sells design skills. Indeed, from 2015 to theses days, we saw two phenomenons:

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/634054c00f60203c4cb30692_pexels-elvis-2528118%207.png)

### Benifits  of UX :

- The rise of UX design freelancers
- The first one is the rise of independent experts
- Now common for them to work with freelancers
- Large organizations compete now

### When Capgemini, Mckinsey, Accenture, and IBM became design experts in their field

The last thing that pushed us to change our model and build a collaborative UX design tools was passion. Design is more than a methodology for us; it is a state of mind. And we want to incorporate that vision into intuitive products that will guide our users to a new way of thinking. We love building digital things and are like kids making a treehouse. We are proud of it, and we want to invite you in  So, we are pleased to invite you to join our community .

Crypto Basics

# Best Crypto YouTube Channels in 2024 - Token Metrics Moon Awards

Discover the top crypto YouTube channels of 2024 with the Token Metrics Moon Awards. Stay ahead in crypto trends and insights for savvy investments.

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/674865ffdcb79a2f6905d4b6_tm-logo-sm.svg)\\
\\
Token Metrics Team](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/author/token-metrics-team)

5 Minutes

![Best Crypto YouTube Channels](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/65e6d31717075d1f3c99e752_Crypto%20YouTube%20Channels%20-%20Top%20Image.webp)

Table of contents

[List of the Best Crypto YouTube Channels in 2024](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-crypto-youtube-channels#list-of-the-best-crypto-youtube-channels-in-2024) [Token Metrics](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-crypto-youtube-channels#token-metrics) [Coin Bureau](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-crypto-youtube-channels#coin-bureau) [Crypto Banter](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-crypto-youtube-channels#crypto-banter) [Altcoin Daily](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-crypto-youtube-channels#altcoin-daily) [Ivan on Tech](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-crypto-youtube-channels#ivan-on-tech) [Alex Becker](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-crypto-youtube-channels#alex-becker) [Virtual Bacon](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-crypto-youtube-channels#virtual-bacon) [Elliotrades](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-crypto-youtube-channels#elliotrades) [Ben Armstrong](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-crypto-youtube-channels#ben-armstrong) [Paul Barron Network](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-crypto-youtube-channels#paul-barron-network) [Conclusion](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-crypto-youtube-channels#conclusion) [Disclaimer](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-crypto-youtube-channels#disclaimer)

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b7877bd7dd2318cd3fe9a_Vector-2.svg)](https://twitter.com/tokenmetricsinc)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b7876de5c8d5e84bc18d0_Vector-1.svg)](https://www.facebook.com/tokenmetrics/)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b78762f9c2251084fe444_Vector.svg)](https://www.linkedin.com/company/tokenmetrics/)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/64461a3c22449c30f8100f2a_Blog_YT.svg)](https://www.youtube.com/tokenmetrics?sub_confirmation=1)

Welcome to the Token Metrics Moon Awards, a prestigious accolade in the cryptocurrency industry, honoring platforms, projects, and initiatives that have significantly impacted the industry.

Today, we are thrilled to introduce a new category of Moon Awards - the Best Crypto YouTube Channels in 2024.

**Selection Process**

At Token Metrics, we emphasize our audience, considering them the foundation of our operations. Our approach, deeply rooted in community engagement, ensures that the outcomes of our awards genuinely reflect crypto enthusiasts' sentiments and experiences.

**Empowering Community Perspectives**

The Moon Awards by Token Metrics aim to amplify the community's voice, offering a clear and focused assessment of the entities propelling advancements in the industry.

By actively involving our community members and utilizing user voting, we have thoughtfully curated a comprehensive list of the Best Crypto YouTube Channels in 2024, drawing from a wealth of survey data and user input.

This article will explore the best crypto YouTube channels in 2024, providing you with a comprehensive list of channels to follow and engage with.

## List of the Best Crypto YouTube Channels in 2024

![Best Crypto YouTube Cannels](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/65e6d52b5c1e906f617fab34_Best%20Crypto%20YouTube%20Channels%20in%202024.jpg)

Image Source - Token Metrics Moon Awards

### Token Metrics

In the Moon Awards survey, the Token Metrics YouTube channel secured the top position with **49.6%** of the total votes.

[Token Metrics](https://www.youtube.com/c/TokenMetrics) is a well-known YouTube channel hosted by Ian Balina. Ian shares in-depth analysis and research on various cryptocurrencies.

Their team of experts uses data-driven metrics and machine-learning algorithms to evaluate the potential of different digital assets.

From [fundamental analysis](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/cryptocurrency-analysis-how-to-analyze-cryptocurrencies) to technical analysis, Token Metrics covers many topics that can help you make informed investment decisions.

### Coin Bureau

In the Moon Awards survey, the Coin Bureau YouTube channel secured the 2nd position with **16.5%** of the total votes.

[Coin Bureau](https://www.youtube.com/c/CoinBureau) is a popular YouTube channel hosted by Guy Turner. The channel offers unbiased reviews, market analysis, and insights into the latest trends in the crypto industry.

Whether you're a beginner or an experienced investor, Coin Bureau provides valuable information to help you navigate the complex world of cryptocurrencies.

### Crypto Banter

In the Moon Awards survey, the Crypto Banter YouTube channel secured the 3rd position with **16.5%** of the total votes.

[Crypto Banter](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCN9Nj4tjXbVTLYWN0EKly_Q) is a dynamic YouTube channel hosted by Ran Neuner that offers informative content and entertaining discussions about cryptocurrencies.

The hosts engage with industry experts, traders, and influencers to give viewers valuable insights and market updates. If you're looking for a channel that combines education with entertainment, Crypto Banter is a great choice.

### Altcoin Daily

In the Moon Awards survey, the Altcoin Daily YouTube channel secured the 4th position with **5.8%** of the total votes.

[Altcoin Daily](https://www.youtube.com/@AltcoinDaily) is a popular YouTube channel Aaron and Austin Arnold host focusing on altcoins and blockchain projects. The channel updates the latest news, market trends, and cryptocurrency investment opportunities daily.

With a strong emphasis on research and analysis, Altcoin Daily aims to educate viewers about the potential of different digital assets.

### Ivan on Tech

In the Moon Awards survey, Ivan on Tech YouTube channel secured the 5th position with **2.8%** of the total votes.

[Ivan on Tech](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrYmtJBtLdtm2ov84ulV-yg) is a widely recognized YouTube channel hosted by Ivan Liljeqvist, a blockchain educator and developer. The channel covers various topics, including blockchain technology, cryptocurrencies, and decentralized finance (DeFi).

Ivan's in-depth knowledge and ability to explain complex concepts in a simple manner make his channel a valuable resource for both beginners and experienced crypto enthusiasts.

### Alex Becker

In the Moon Awards survey, Alex Becker's YouTube channel secured the 6th position with **2.3%** of the total votes.

[Alex Becker](https://www.youtube.com/@AlexBeckersChannel) is a prominent figure in the crypto community, and his YouTube channel offers a unique perspective on investing and entrepreneurship. While not solely focused on cryptocurrencies,

Alex provides insights into various investment strategies and opportunities, including the crypto market. His channel is an excellent resource for those looking to broaden their investment horizons.

### Virtual Bacon

In the Moon Awards survey, the Virtual Bacon YouTube channel secured the 7th position with **2%** of the total votes.

[Virtual Bacon](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcrEA_xd9Ldf1C8DIJYdyyA) is a YouTube channel hosted by Dennis dedicated to providing educational content about cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology.

Virtual Bacon covers various topics, including tutorials, market analysis, and project reviews. With a focus on simplifying complex concepts, Virtual Bacon's channel is a valuable resource for beginners in crypto.

### Elliotrades

In the Moon Awards survey, Elliotrades YouTube channel secured the 8th position with **1.7%** of the total votes.

[Elliotrades](https://www.youtube.com/@elliotrades_official) is a YouTube channel that offers technical analysis and market insights for cryptocurrencies. The host, Elliot, combines his expertise in chart analysis with fundamental research to provide viewers with a well-rounded perspective on the market.

Elliotrades offers valuable insights to help you make informed decisions whether you're interested in short-term trading or long-term investing.

### Ben Armstrong

In the Moon Awards survey, Ben Armstrong's YouTube channel secured the 9th position with **1.5%** of the total votes.

[Ben Armstrong](https://www.youtube.com/@BenArmstrongCrypto), also known as BitBoy Crypto, is a popular YouTube personality in the crypto community. His channel covers various topics, including market updates, project reviews, and interviews with industry experts.

With his engaging personality and informative content, Ben Armstrong's channel is a go-to resource for many crypto enthusiasts.

### Paul Barron Network

In the Moon Awards survey, Paul Barron Network's YouTube channel secured the 10th position with **1.4%** of the total votes.

The [Paul Barron Network](https://www.youtube.com/@PaulBarronNetwork) is a YouTube channel that explores the intersection of technology and finance, including cryptocurrencies. The channel provides insights into the latest trends, market analysis, and interviews with industry leaders.

Paul Barron's unique perspective and in-depth coverage make his channel a valuable resource for crypto enthusiasts.

## Conclusion

Staying informed and engaged in cryptocurrencies is essential for making informed investment decisions. The YouTube channels listed above offer a wealth of knowledge, market analysis, and educational content to help you navigate the ever-changing crypto landscape.

Whether you're a beginner or an experienced investor, these channels provide valuable insights and perspectives to enhance your understanding of cryptocurrencies.

Remember always to research and consider multiple sources of information before making any investment decisions in the crypto space.

### We started as a UX design and innovation agency

For those who don’t know yet, we used to be a design agency. We started évolt in 2015 to help clients build and improve digital products and the overall experience of their services. We could work with large international companies on their innovation strategy such as creating a digital product from scratch with tiny startups. We were a young team of UX/UI designers, UX researchers, developers, digital marketing experts, etc.

### The golden age of the design thinking approach

The ‘gold rush time’ of design thinking is happening now. As I said, from freelancers to large consultant companies, everyone sells design skills. Indeed, from 2015 to theses days, we saw two phenomenons:

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/634054c00f60203c4cb30692_pexels-elvis-2528118%207.png)

### Benifits  of UX :

- The rise of UX design freelancers
- The first one is the rise of independent experts
- Now common for them to work with freelancers
- Large organizations compete now

### When Capgemini, Mckinsey, Accenture, and IBM became design experts in their field

The last thing that pushed us to change our model and build a collaborative UX design tools was passion. Design is more than a methodology for us; it is a state of mind. And we want to incorporate that vision into intuitive products that will guide our users to a new way of thinking. We love building digital things and are like kids making a treehouse. We are proud of it, and we want to invite you in  So, we are pleased to invite you to join our community .

# Ian Balina

Founder & CEO

Ian is the founder and CEO of Token Metrics. He has appeared in CNBC, Bloomberg, Wall Street Journal, Forbes, Business Insider, and Entrepreneur Magazine for his work in cryptocurrencies, analytics and entrepreneurship.

A former analytics evangelist at IBM Watson, he brings a data-driven, “moneyball” approach to investing in crypto.

In 2017, Ian used this approach to turn $20,000 into over $5 million. He did this while publicly documenting his investments via an online spreadsheet, and that work formed the basis of the Token Metrics platform.

Originally from humble means, Mr. Balina is dedicated to giving back through his philanthropic efforts with Children of Uganda and Black Girls Code.

# 24 Hours Left: Secure Your Place in the TMAI Revolution! ⏳

The excitement is electric! In just 24 hours, the TMAI Token Generation Event (TGE) goes live.

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/674865ffdcb79a2f6905d4b6_tm-logo-sm.svg)\\
\\
Token Metrics Team](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/author/token-metrics-team)

3 min

![24 Hours Left: Secure Your Place in the TMAI Revolution! ⏳](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/674f6397105d557cbf0327e3_Screenshot%202024-12-03%20204640.png)

Table of contents

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b7877bd7dd2318cd3fe9a_Vector-2.svg)](https://twitter.com/tokenmetricsinc)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b7876de5c8d5e84bc18d0_Vector-1.svg)](https://www.facebook.com/tokenmetrics/)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b78762f9c2251084fe444_Vector.svg)](https://www.linkedin.com/company/tokenmetrics/)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/64461a3c22449c30f8100f2a_Blog_YT.svg)](https://www.youtube.com/tokenmetrics?sub_confirmation=1)

#### **Introduction**

**The excitement is electric!** In just **24 hours**, the **TMAI Token Generation Event (TGE)** goes live. This is your golden opportunity to join a community set to redefine the crypto trading landscape.

Our mission has always been clear: **to help crypto traders and investors find the next 100x and build generational wealth**. With **TMAI**, we're taking a monumental step towards making this mission a reality.

**"The moon is not the limit to the moon and beyond."** Let's reach new heights together!

#### **Why You Can't Miss This Opportunity**

**Harness the Power of Advanced AI**

- **Exclusive Access**: Early participants will gain first access to the TMAI Agent and our comprehensive suite of AI-driven tools, which will launch on the Token Metrics platform this month.

- **Stay Ahead of the Curve**: Navigate the crypto market with insights refined over two major market cycles, leveraging data that most new AI agents don't have.

**Community-Driven Benefits**

- **Priority Features**: Unlock premium features on the Token Metrics platform ahead of others using your TMAI tokens.

- **Influence the Future**: Your participation helps steer the direction and growth of our ecosystem.

- **Revenue Sharing with DAO**: As part of our **for-profit DAO**, you can share in the revenue generated and influence how it's utilized.

**Testimonials from Our Community**

- _"I followed a MATIC tip from one of your shows and turned an initial investment of around $200 into an impressive $25,000. Thank you for the valuable insights and guidance."_ **_\- Shane_**

**_‍_**

- _"Token Metrics stands out for its strong community connection, with the owner actively engaging and providing updates. Beyond updates, the platform educates users on the importance of AI in selecting coins, offering immense value to paid members."_ **_\- Joseph_**

**_‍_**

- _"Token Metrics reminds me of BlackRock’s 'Aladdin' in its early stages. I am excited about the future with Token Metrics and would like to give a big shout-out to the entire team behind it for making this great tool possible and continuing to develop it." -_ **_Stefano_**

**_‍_**

- _"Token Metrics helps streamline project vetting and discovery, including pre-market opportunities. The platform combines data-driven analytics with expert insights, offering valuable discussions on venture projects and detailed explanations like FDV." -_ **_Christopher_**

#### **Your Checklist to Get Started**

1. **Prepare Your Exchange Account** some text
   - **Gate.io**: [Register Here](http://gate.io/startup/2063)
   - **MEXC**: [Register Here](https://www.mexc.com/register?inviteCode=mexc-2djd4)
2. **Secure Your Assets** some text
   - Enable 2FA and verify your account details for maximum security.
3. **Fund Your Account** some text
   - Deposit the necessary funds in preparation for the TGE.
4. **Set a Reminder** some text
   - The TGE goes live on **December 4th** at **3 pm UTC**.

#### **Watch the TMAI TGE Launch Video Tomorrow**

Don't miss our exclusive TMAI launch video, in which Token Metrics CEO Ian Balina dives in-depth into TMAI, its long-term vision, and why crypto and the intersection of AI are the future.

- [**Subscribe to our YouTube to watch the video tomorrow**](https://www.youtube.com/@TokenMetrics?sub_confirmation=1)

#### **Conclusion**

Opportunities like this are rare. Join the TMAI revolution and elevate your crypto journey to unprecedented heights.

**Stay Connected:**

- **Twitter (X)**: [@TokenMetrics](https://twitter.com/TokenMetrics)
- **Telegram**: [Token Metrics Community](https://t.me/TokenMetrics)

‍

## Frequently Asked Questions

What is Token Metrics?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/654b2be0636f254a9b46c94c_Dark-FAQ%20Dropdown.svg)

Token Metrics is a cryptocurrency investment research firm that uses AI and Machine learning and our data scientists, quant traders, and crypto native research analysts to provide timely insights on more than 6,000 crypto and NFT projects.

How does Token Metrics use Artificial Intelligence to accurately predict and rank various cryptocurrencies?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/654b2be0636f254a9b46c94c_Dark-FAQ%20Dropdown.svg)

Our AI and Machine Learning algorithms identify potential trends and predict future price movements by considering factors such as Fundamental Reports, Code Quality, Sentiment Analysis, Moving Averages, and Support/Resistance levels, among many others.

What resources does Token Metrics offer to assist both novice and experienced investors make informed decisions?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/654b2be0636f254a9b46c94c_Dark-FAQ%20Dropdown.svg)

Token Metrics provides tutorials, videos, webinars, and detailed investment reports. These resources cover topics such as blockchain technology, cryptocurrency basics, investment strategies, risk management, hidden gems, and market analysis.

Can Token Metrics help me create and manage a diversified cryptocurrency portfolio?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/654b2be0636f254a9b46c94c_Dark-FAQ%20Dropdown.svg)

Absolutely! Token Metrics provides various tools and resources to help you construct and manage a diversified cryptocurrency portfolio. Our AI Chatbot and Analytics Platform can provide real-time insights, data, analysis, and investment guidance, while our Trading Bot can automate trades based on your strategy.

How does Token Metrics stay up-to-date with the latest trends and developments in the cryptocurrency market?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/654b2be0636f254a9b46c94c_Dark-FAQ%20Dropdown.svg)

We employ several data aggregation techniques to collect and process real-time data from various sources, which include cryptocurrency exchanges, blockchain networks, social media platforms, news outlets, regulatory announcements, and other relevant sources.

Are there any pricing plans or packages available for these products, and do you offer any discounts for bundled purchases?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/654b2be0636f254a9b46c94c_Dark-FAQ%20Dropdown.svg)

Certainly! For information about pricing plans, packages, and any potential discounts for bundled purchases, please contact [support@tokenmetrics.com](mailto:support@tokenmetrics.com), as they can provide you with available packages and discounts.

What kind of security measures are in place to protect my data and privacy when using these products?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/654b2be0636f254a9b46c94c_Dark-FAQ%20Dropdown.svg)

Our Cybersecurity team monitors the platform 24/7 and invests in secure infrastructure, including firewalls, intrusion detection and prevention systems, and robust network security protocols. This helps protect against any potential unauthorized access, data breaches, and other malicious activities.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/654b224702e81aaab21ebca7_Dark-Ellipse4.webp)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/654b224702e81aaab21ebca7_Dark-Ellipse4.webp)

Join Ian Balina and other expert investors for an immersive, interactive experience in the world of crypto investing.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/6593a42d7da1e8db63be8303_Guest%20Speakers-02.svg)

## Guest Speakers

# We are Hiring!

Careers

# Join the Team of Innovative Thinkers and Problem Solvers

**We want to hear from you!** Token Metrics is a rapidly growing startup, and we're always on the lookout for passionate, like-minded individuals who are eager to innovate and grow with us.

[See Openings](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/careers#)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/6749ad63d21c79634ae2cb41_3728.jpg)

## Token Metrics recognized as one of the Best Companies for Remote Jobs by Forbes.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/6749ad63d21c79634ae2cb46_ff.png)

## Perks & Benefits

Join Token Metrics and enjoy a range of perks designed to support your professional growth, work-life balance, and long-term success.

##### Competitive Salary and Stock Options

We offer a market-competitive salary along with stock options to give you a stake in our success, ensuring you're rewarded for the value you bring to the company.

##### Professional Development Opportunities

Grow your skills with access to online courses and training programs designed to support your career growth, helping you stay ahead in the fast-evolving tech landscape.

##### Employer of Record (EOR) Services

For select countries, we provide EOR services to manage employment compliance, payroll, and benefits, making it easier for international team members to focus on their work.

##### Career Growth Opportunities

We encourage internal promotions and offer clear career progression pathways, ensuring you're supported in achieving your long-term professional goals within Token Metrics.

## Open Positions

Discover opportunities to join a dynamic team that's shaping the future of project management software.

## Our Application Process

Discover opportunities to join a dynamic team that's shaping the future of project management software.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/6749ad63d21c79634ae2cb49_gif1.gif)

##### Application  Review

We carefully review each application to ensure it aligns with the requirements of the position.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/6749ad63d21c79634ae2cb4f_gif2.gif)

##### Pre-Screening  Assessments

Qualified candidates will be invited to complete pre-screening assessments to evaluate their skills and knowledge.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/6749ad63d21c79634ae2cb52_gif3.gif)

##### Participation  in Interview

Selected candidates will participate in interviews with our hiring team to assess their fit with our company culture and values.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/6749ad63d21c79634ae2cb4c_gif4.gif)

##### Work Trial

For certain roles, we may offer work trials to give candidates hands-on experience and evaluate their performance.

# Your Path to Success Starts Here

Are you ready to take your career to new heights? Join Token Metrics, where innovation meets opportunity. With our platform, you'll have the tools you need to excel and grow professionally. Here's how Token Metrics can help you elevate your career.

# 8 Best AI Chatbots to Try in 2023

Learn everything about AI chatbots and explore 8 best options in this post.

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/674865ffdcb79a2f6905d4b6_tm-logo-sm.svg)\\
\\
Token Metrics Team](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/author/token-metrics-team)

6 Minutes

![Best AI Chatbots](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/6493311b4fb3f00cc62310f1_Best%20AI%20Chatbots.webp)

Table of contents

[What is an AI Chatbot?](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-ai-chatbots#what-is-an-ai-chatbot) [List of Best AI Chatbots](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-ai-chatbots#list-of-best-ai-chatbots) [1\. ChatGPT](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-ai-chatbots#1-chatgpt) [2\. Token Metrics AI](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-ai-chatbots#2-token-metrics-ai) [3\. Salesforce Einstein](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-ai-chatbots#8-salesforce-einstein) [Benefits of Using AI Chatbots](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-ai-chatbots#benefits-of-using-ai-chatbots) [Conclusion](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-ai-chatbots#conclusion) [Disclaimer](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/best-ai-chatbots#disclaimer)

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b7877bd7dd2318cd3fe9a_Vector-2.svg)](https://twitter.com/tokenmetricsinc)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b7876de5c8d5e84bc18d0_Vector-1.svg)](https://www.facebook.com/tokenmetrics/)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b78762f9c2251084fe444_Vector.svg)](https://www.linkedin.com/company/tokenmetrics/)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/64461a3c22449c30f8100f2a_Blog_YT.svg)](https://www.youtube.com/tokenmetrics?sub_confirmation=1)

In today's technology-driven world, AI chatbots have become powerful tools that are transforming the way we engage in digital conversations.

These intelligent virtual assistants possess the remarkable ability to simulate human-like conversations, making them indispensable across a wide range of industries, including finance, IT, sales, and marketing.

While the popularity of ChatGPT has grown significantly, its everyday usage has been hindered by frequent capacity constraints, leading to unreliability.

However, there is a positive aspect to this situation. Numerous equally capable AI chatbots are readily available, ensuring accessibility whenever you need their assistance.

To simplify your decision-making process, we have curated a comprehensive list of few popular and widely used AI chatbots in the market.

This compilation provides detailed information that will equip you with everything you need to know before selecting your next reliable AI companion.

## What is an AI Chatbot?

The AI Chatbot is a computer program that utilize artificial intelligence techniques, including natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning, to simulate human-like conversations with users.

These intelligent virtual assistants can interpret and respond to user queries, providing information, assistance, and support in real-time.

The AI Chatbot can be integrated into website, messaging platforms, mobile apps, and other digital channels to facilitate seamless communication between businesses and customers.

## List of Best AI Chatbots

Below is a compilation of the best AI chatbots for 2023. Take a closer look to discover the one that aligns perfectly with your needs.

### 1\. ChatGPT

ChatGPT, powered by OpenAI's GPT-4, is an AI chatbot that excels in natural language processing and contextual understanding. Unlike rule-based chatbots, ChatGPT uses advanced machine learning techniques to mimic human conversation styles and provide related and original responses.

Whether it's answering simple questions, generating content ideas, or even ideating marketing emails, ChatGPT's capabilities continue to improve over time as it engages in more conversations. The best part? ChatGPT basic version is available for free, making it accessible for everyone.

### 2\. Token Metrics AI

[Token Metrics AI](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/chatbot) is a groundbreaking product that transforms the cryptocurrency trading experience for users. It saves time by providing swift responses, real-time analysis, and instant market updates.

Users can access specific data, receive data-driven insights, and make informed decisions backed by AI-powered analytics. The AI Chatbot is available 24/7, enhancing user experience with easy navigation and interactive engagement.

It streamlines research, empowers decision-making, and creates a dynamic and efficient platform for cryptocurrency traders.

### 3\. ChatSpot

ChatSpot, developed by HubSpot, is a conversational CRM bot that empowers sales, marketing, and service professionals to maximize productivity.

Its chat-based commands enable users to draft follow-up emails, compile analytics reports, and even prospect.

By connecting to HubSpot software and leveraging existing data, ChatSpot streamlines customer interactions and enhances overall efficiency. Although it is currently in alpha for HubSpot users, ChatSpot shows great promise in revolutionizing conversational CRM.

### 4\. Bing Chat

Bing Chat, developed by Microsoft, is an AI-powered co-pilot that leverages NLP and ML to understand conversation prompts.

With its compose feature, Bing Chat can generate original written content and images, while its powerful search engine capabilities provide answers from the web.

As a conversational tool, Bing Chat allows users to continue messaging until they are satisfied. The best part? [Bing](https://www.bing.com/new) Chat is available for free, making it an attractive option for businesses looking to enhance customer service.

### 5\. Bard

Bard, developed by Google, is a multi-use AI chatbot that utilizes Google's LaMDA language model. From brainstorming and ideation to drafting unique and original content, Bard offers a wide range of functionalities.

Connected to Google's extensive website index, Bard can access information from the internet, making it a valuable resource for users seeking accurate and up-to-date information. With its advanced conversational abilities, Bard is pushing the boundaries of what AI chatbots can achieve.

### 6\. Watson Assistant

IBM Watson Assistant is an AI-powered conversational bot that leverages natural language processing and machine learning techniques to gather contextual information.

It offers impressive recommendations for further training, ensuring continuous improvement in its performance. By training it with industry and business-specific data, users can expect to receive business-relevant information during interactions.

It seamlessly integrates into websites, messaging channels, customer service tools, and mobile apps, providing a low-code builder for quick and efficient deployment.

### 7\. Zendesk Answer Bot

Zendesk Answer Bot is a game-changing solution that transforms customer conversations by seamlessly integrating with your knowledge base. This intelligent bot utilizes data to deliver high-quality, omnichannel interactions, ensuring an enhanced customer experience.

With the versatile Flow Builder, you have the power to create custom AI-powered conversation flows that align with your specific requirements. Its deep learning capabilities enable it to contextualize conversations and accurately interpret the intent behind customer queries.

In cases where additional support is needed, the bot provides insights and suggestions to live agents, enabling them to deliver efficient solutions in a timely manner.

### 8\. Salesforce Einstein

Salesforce Einstein is a highly advanced conversational bot that offers native integration with all Salesforce products. With its foundation in predictive intelligence and machine learning, it possesses the ability to build contextual understanding.

By leveraging existing Salesforce data, it surfaces the most suitable responses to address customer inquiries. Moreover, it includes the capability to route urgent conversations to human agents, ensuring prompt attention and resolution.

## Benefits of Using AI Chatbots

**Enhanced Efficiency and Productivity**

1\. AI chatbots automate repetitive tasks, freeing up valuable time for human agents to focus on more complex and strategic activities.

2\. They provide instant responses, reducing customer wait times and streamlining operations.

**Improved Customer Experience**

1\. AI chatbots offer 24/7 availability, ensuring customers receive assistance whenever they need it, enhancing overall satisfaction.

2\. They provide personalized experiences by analyzing user data, preferences, and purchase history, resulting in tailored recommendations and solutions.

**Cost Savings and Scalability**

1\. Implementing AI chatbots can significantly reduce operational costs by minimizing the need for human resources.

2\. These chatbots can handle an unlimited number of conversations simultaneously, ensuring scalability even during peak periods.

**Real-Time Analytics and Insights**

1\. AI chatbots generate valuable data and insights that help businesses understand customer behavior, preferences, and pain points.

2\. This data can be leveraged to optimize marketing strategies, improve products or services, and enhance overall business performance.

## Conclusion

In conclusion, AI chatbots have emerged as a powerful and invaluable tool for professionals in diverse industries. These intelligent virtual assistants have transformed the way professionals handle their work, excelling in automating repetitive tasks and allowing individuals to allocate their time toward more strategic and creative pursuits.

Whether it's managing appointments, addressing routine inquiries, conducting research and analysis, aiding in decision-making, or delivering timely updates, AI chatbots serve as trusted aides.

By leveraging the capabilities of AI chatbots, professionals can optimize their workflows, enhance productivity, and effectively achieve their goals.

### Disclaimer

The information provided on this website does not constitute investment advice, financial advice, trading advice, or any other sort of advice and you should not treat any of the website's content as such.

[Token Metrics](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/) does not recommend that any cryptocurrency should be bought, sold, or held by you. Do conduct your own due diligence and consult your financial advisor before making any investment decisions.
